news_header: Stora Enso's performance improved in Q4 2024, with turnover of EUR 2,322 million and an adjusted operating result of EUR 121 million. The company plans to pay a dividend of EUR 0.25 per share in 2025.
news_original_title: Stora Enson tulos lähelle ennusteita – Osinko nousee
news_text: Stora Enso reported improved results for the fourth quarter of 2024, achieving a turnover of EUR 2,322 million, surpassing analysts' expectations. The adjusted operating result was EUR 121 million, significantly up from EUR 51 million in the previous year. The company plans to distribute a dividend of EUR 0.25 per share in two installments in 2025. Despite challenges such as high wood costs and macroeconomic uncertainties, Stora Enso's operational efficiency measures led to a 75% increase in the adjusted operating result for the year, totaling EUR 598 million. Future investments include a new packaging board line at the Oulu plant, expected to impact operating results negatively in early 2025.
